dmca.title: Mir Internet Marketing Claims Copyright Infringement (#41)
dmca.body:
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[private]
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc.
[private]
Chicago, Illinois 60607

March 09, 2004

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043

Dear Google Customer Support Professionals,

1.	The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on http://www.seologic.com/faq/searchengines-password-protection.php

Search Queries: http://www.google.com/search?q=%22couple+pages+of+each+of+your+articles,+but+require+registration%22&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&fllter=0 "couple pages of each of your articles, but require registration"

http://www.google.com/search?q=%22certain+content+on+the+site,+and+they+ password+protect+that+content%22&hl=en&lr=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&filter=0
certain content on the site, and they password protect that content"

http://www.google.com/search?q=%22good+spider+food+for+attracting+vis itors+via+the+search%22&hl=en<=&ie=UTF-8&oe=UTF-8&filter=0
	"good spider food for attracting visitors via the search"

Infringing Web Pages: 
http://www.1-hit.com/faq/password-protected-search-engine.htm

2.	My Contact Information:  [private]@internetmadeeasy.com

3,	Infringer's Contact Information: 1-Hit, [private], [private], The Netherlands, Phone: [private], Email: info@1-hit.com

4.	I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

5.	I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

C. J. Newton, CEO 
Mir Internet Marketing, Inc. 
[private] 
[private]
